item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info: http://bit.ly/webinartime
------------------------------
Reesio cordially invites you to a training webinar on Wednesday, August 22nd from 6:30-8:00 PM on how to sell your home or investment property for a flat $1,000.

This training session will cover:
The Reesio Difference
Creating a Listing
Free Photography, Price Evaluation, and Open Houses for Your Property
Marketing of Your Listing
Automation of Every Document and Step in the Real Estate Process
Live Support with Licensed Brokers When You Need It
Q&A

After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the Webinar.


RSVP to obtain participation info: http://bit.ly/webinartime
item.name: The New Way to Sell Your Home or Investment Property
